  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:fizleti/120509</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:fizleti/120509</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Dva  skrita naboja</string>
            <string language="en">Two hidden charges</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zwei versteckte Ladungen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Deux frais cachés</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Duas cargas escondidas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Due spese nascoste</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δύο κρυμμένες δαπάνες</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Dos cargas ocultadas</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Nabit delec premikamo po krožnici okoli dveh nezanih nabitih delcev in zraven merimo električno silo.</string>
            <string language="en">Charged particle is moved on a circular path around the two particles with unknown charge.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">coulombov zakon</string>
            <string language="en">coulomb's law</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">elektrostatika</string>
            <string language="en">electrostatics</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Belasteter Partikel wird auf einem kreisförmigen
Pfad um die zwei Partikel mit unbekannter Ladung verschoben.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La particule chargée est déplacée sur une voie
d'accès circulaire autour des deux particules avec la charge 
inconnue.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A partícula carregada é movida em um trajeto 
circular em torno das duas partículas com carga desconhecida.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La particella caricata è spostata su un percorso
circolare intorno alle due particelle con la carica sconosciuta.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το χρεωμένο μόριο κινείται σε ένα κυκλικό μονοπάτι 
περίπου τα δύο μόρια με την άγνωστη δαπάνη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La partícula cargada se mueve en un camino 
circular alrededor de las dos partículas con la carga desconocida.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gesetz des Coulombs</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Electrostatics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la loi du coulomb</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">electrostatics</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-pt">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">lei do coulomb</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">electrostatics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">legge del coulomb</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">electrostatics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">νόμος Coulomb</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
